overview_of_class: This course will focus on helping students become engaged interviewers and critical listeners. Each student will produce three audio stories for this class. Students will give and receive feedback to each other and work in teams to create a pilot episode for a podcast. The course involves significant reporting outside of class.
name: Podcasting
title: JOUR JOUR 291-0-20 Podcasting

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will focus on helping students become engaged interviewers and critical listeners. Each student will produce three audio stories for this class. Students will give and receive feedback to each other and work in teams to create a pilot episode for a podcast. The course involves significant reporting outside of class.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Registration by application only. The application is available at tinyurl.com/podcastingapply
